title: La Chasse Royale = Royal Hunt
brief_description:
Story of love between a young girl and a hunter in the Tatra Mountain of Czechoslovakia. Reference: Film Index International.

Credits: Director, Francois Leterrier ; photography, Jean Badal ; music, Zdenek Liska.
Cast: Sami Frey, Ludmilla Mikael, Claude Brasseur, Suzanne Flon.
